Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red/grey pottery vessel, interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a burnished cream-coloured slip and with faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents (meat ?).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393183) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393183)
